title: Digital Game-Based Science Learning Design: Application of Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Gamified integration of work-linked science concepts for corporate learners

learning_goals: Learners can explain molecular structure assembly principles with over 80% accuracy through mobile game-based simulations
Learners iteratively perform the scientific inquiry method (hypothesis-experiment-analysis) stages at least three times during in-game problem-solving
Learners can generate personalized diagnostic reports on science concept comprehension based on game achievement data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
